SEARCH
Package com.vaadin.starter.bakery.ui.views.storefront

Class OrderCard

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.starter.bakery.ui.views.storefront.OrderCard
public class OrderCard extends Object
Help class to get ready to use LitRenderer for displaying order card list on the Storefront and Dashboard grids. Using LitRenderer instead of ComponentRenderer optimizes the CPU and memory consumption.

In addition, component includes an optional header above the order card. It is used to visually separate orders into groups. Technically all order cards are equivalent, but those that do have the header visible create a visual group separation.
